page.title: 20Malvern College Contributors
page.content:
INFORMATION SYSTEMS For this unit 45 people were involved with the data collection and presentation. The Amenity Survey and many interviews were conducted by 37 13-year-old boys at{Malvern College under the supervision of Mr. Norman Rosser, Mr. Julian Ellis and Mr. Charles Ricketts.
TEXT EDITORS {Norman Rosser} Geography Dept. {Julian Ellis } Geography Dept. TEXT CONTRIBUTORS {Michael McNevin} Hills Conservators {David Penter } Biology Dept. {Philip Turner } Author & Historian {Keith Wilkinson} College Chaplain PHOTOGRAPHY {Bill Denny } Art Dept. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE {David Chaundy} Computing Dept.
